```{r package load}
library(BiocManager)
library(annotate)
library(ape)
library(ggtree)
library(seqinr)
library(Biostrings)
library(wesanderson)
library(viridis)
library(ggplot2)
```



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
seq <- readAAStringSet("./input/sequence.fa")
seqDF <- data.frame(seq)
names(seqDF) <- c("seq")
seqDF <- cbind("WNV Variant" = rownames(seqDF), seqDF)
seqAA<-sapply(seqDF$seq,strsplit,split="")
names(seqAA)<-paste(seqDF$`WNV variant`)
seqAA<- as.AAbin(seqAA)
```

```{r}
seqAlign<-muscle(seqAA,quiet=F)
alview(seqAlign)
monopic <- image.AAbin(seqAlign, bg = (wes_palette("Darjeeling1")[5]), col = wes_palette("Darjeeling1"), ylab = "WNV Variants", xlab = "Sequence Length", show.labels = T, cex.lab = 0.5, legend = T, aa.cex = 0.8)
```

```{r}
## Generate a distance matrix.
install.packages("phangorn")
library(phangorn) # Load phangorn library.
seqAlign<-as.phyDat(seqAlign)
class(seqAlign) #phyDat

seqDM1<-dist.ml(seqAlign) # generate distance matrix based on AA sequences; default model is JC69 (equal base frequencies).
seqDM<-dist.ml(seqAlign,model="F81") # appear very similar. Not sure which is the correct model to use.
class(seqDM) # Dist
length(seqDM) # 2346
?dist.ml

seqDMmat<-as.matrix(seqDM) # convert to matrix format.
dim(seqDMmat) # 69 x 69

## Melt to a linear matrix.
library(reshape2)
DMMat<-melt(seqDMmat) # Linear matrix.
ggplot(data=DMMat,aes(x=Var1,y=Var2,fill=value)) + geom_tile() + scale_fill_gradientn(colours=c("white","blue","green","red"))

```
